comments.body:
use ``from pandas import get_dummies, melt, lreshape, wide_to_long``. 

in tests we always want to use the user call (rather than a specific import)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@from pandas.util.testing import assert_frame_equal

from pandas.core.reshape.reshape import get_dummies
from pandas.core.reshape.melt import melt, lreshape, wide_to_long
import pandas.util.testing as tm
